meanings.def: produced or practised without using artificial chemicals
examples: The farm went fully organic in 1996.

meanings.def: produced by or from living things
examples: Improve the soil by adding organic matter.

meanings.def: relating to chemical compounds that contain carbon and mainly or ultimately come from living things
connected with the organs of the body
consisting of different parts that are all connected to each other
examples: the view of society as an organic whole

meanings.def: happening in a slow and natural way, rather than suddenly
examples: the organic growth of foreign markets
